mapper.select: select * from knowhow_reply order by knowhow_reply_no desc

select a.knowhow_reply_no, a.knh_no, a.knowhow_replyer, a.knowhow_replytext, a.regdate, a.updatedate, b.mber_ncnm from knowhow_reply a , member b where b.mber_sn = a.knowhow_replyer order by knowhow_reply_no desc

select a.knowhow_reply_no, a.knh_no, a.knowhow_replyer, a.knowhow_replytext, a.regdate, a.updatedate, b.mber_ncnm from knowhow_reply a , member b where b.mber_sn = a.knowhow_replyer and a.knh_no = #{kno_no} order by knowhow_reply_no desc
mapper.update: INSERT INTO knowhow_reply ( knowhow_reply_no, knh_no, knowhow_replyer, knowhow_replytext ) VALUES ( #{knowhow_reply_no}, #{knh_no}, #{knowhow_replyer}, #{knowhow_replytext} )
UPDATE knowhow_reply SET knowhow_replytext = #{knowhow_replytext}, updatedate = to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE knowhow_reply_no = #{knowhow_reply_no}
